I was like maybe they squished it in the mailbox..NO. nothing in there either. i went to get more information about it on the shippers website it said signed AND delivered. I never signed anything which really upset me. I went on  â€œOnTracâ€ costumer service to see if they help me with it..nothing happened I COMPLAINED 3 times that I wanted my package or my money because thatâ€™s absolutely unacceptable. And what a surprise that I got blocked from the website. And SHEIN didnâ€™t want to help me either.. I am extremely upset with SHEIN. And I feel like this is extremely unprofessional for a big â€œtrustingâ€ company. I will never be ordering from SHEIN again and neither will my family.
